overview: 3 Mercer Mayer Stories - Approx. 30 minutes. (1985)  "Herbert the Timid Dragon"  "Just for You" (featuring Little Critter)  "How the Trollusk Got His Hat"  - Re-released in 1991 as Herbert the Timid Dragon and Other Tales and in 1994 as "The Best Stories 3"
title: Mercer Mayer - Three Stories
